original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND p.Score>=-2 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=12 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=6 AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-18 08:54:12' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views=0 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=60
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -2 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 12) AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 6)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views = 0 AND (CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) <= 60)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E4E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E4E2.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-18 08:54:12'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4E2E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4E2E5.UserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E2E5E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E2E5E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E4E2E5E3.UserId)
